message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. I believe this is fair considering the risk and potential future value loss due to inflation.
I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is fair, considering the risk of inflation.  It's a more equitable distribution that still acknowledges your initial generosity.
I propose an equal split of the $10000, recognizing the risk of inflation and aiming for fairness in our division. I hope this proposal aligns with your expectations.
